Title: btw this is why vim is actually MORE useful in the age of LLMs. I asked claude for a command to get ...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: btw this is why vim is actually MORE useful in the age of LLMs. I asked claude for a command to get this number and it gave me a one liner that computed this number. I asked how to do it with vscode and it gave an 8 step process which started with "install npm"
